name: Rainbow Rave
description:
Intro:

Beyond the Rainbow there is a party… The wildes one in all of Unicorn-Heaven! And everybody knows: Unicorns party hard!

A psychedelic celebration experience with more cuteness and space-drugss than most can stomage. Turn the music up and bring your friends!

GamePlay:

Drink as much as you can while avoiding to fall over and lose some of that good stuff. The controls become more wonky the fuller you get.

Development

Game Engine: Unity. Modelling: Maya, ..
